page.title: 14TRADE _ Local Firms
page.content: {HITCHINS}is situated at the top of the hill in old buildings that have been converted into modern offices where there is a computer.It started as a small family building firm 25 years ago but has now expanded and five architects design large developments at home and abroad.Building work is contracted out but one section of the firm screeds floors that are in awkward places by using hose. {COUNTY CURTAINS} Up until 20 years ago Belverdere Farm was run as a small mixed farm.Now it is a small soft furnishing business making curtains for companies in the city.Twelve people are employed but most of these collect work and take it home to finish.The curtains are cut out on a long table and when they are finished they are hung up until they are delivered.
